fees.description: Membership of $25 per month (inc. GST) to access these wholesale rates.
A $16 (inc. GST) fee applies if full payment has not been received by the invoice due date
An $3 (inc. GST) fee applies if payment is dishonoured or reversed.
A fee of 1% applies to payments made by credit or debit card
Standard Connection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
Standard Disconnection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information

electricityContract.terms: Usage price is a 12 month average estimate, based on a typical household solar (8kW) and battery (13kWh) set up in your network with an Amber SmartShift compatible battery and annual load of 8500kWh and annual exports of 4300kWh (assumes tariff 15). Includes Ambers monthly subscription. See www.amber.com.au/pricing for full details. Prices are not fixed. Amber passes through wholesale electricity prices directly at cost. For full terms and conditions, visit https://www.amber.com.au/terms

discounts.description: Welcome credit of $210 applied over 12 months. New residential customers only who are also customers of CommBank (CBA) in the Yello Diamond segment and link their CBA credit card or bank account as Amber payment method. Customers are ineligible to receive any remaining credit months if they cancel their Amber account, switch their payment method to a non-CBA account, or their CBA card expires. Additional eligibility requirements apply, see Amber website.

electricityContract.variation: Usage price is a 12 month average estimate only. Actual prices are not fixed and change every 5 or 30 minutes (depending on meter compatibility). Usage is charged at the same wholesale electricity costs that are charged to us. Prices are determined by a range of factors, including government rebates, network fees and wholesale market costs. You are protected by the Amber Bill Guarantee Rates available here https://www.amber.com.au/factsheets/factsheets

eligibility.description: Usage price estimate based on a typical household solar system of 8kWs.
Usage price estimate based on a typical household Amber SmartShift compatible battery system of 13kWhs.

Welcome credit of $210 applied over 12 months. New residential customers only who are also customers of CommBank (CBA) in the Yello Diamond segment and link their CBA credit card or bank account as Amber payment method. Customers are ineligible to receive any remaining credit months if they cancel their Amber account, switch their payment method to a non-CBA account, or their CBA card expires. Additional eligibility requirements apply, see Amber website.

greenPowerCharges.description: 100% GreenPower for 3.01 cents/kWh (inc. GST) option avaliable. See website for more information.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Feed-in price is a 12 month average estimate, based on a typical household solar (8kW) and battery (13kWh) set up in your network with an Amber SmartShift compatible battery and annual load of 8500kWh and annual exports of 4300kWh (assumes tariff 15). Prices are not fixed. Amber passes through wholesale electricity prices directly at cost and has a guaranteed minimum feed-in price of 0c/kWh over a financial year. See www.amber.com.au/pricing for full details.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Amber Offers no lock in contracts or exit fees. Prices may vary in accordance with the terms and conditions.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Standard fees are listed www.amber.com.au/fees, but additional service costs passed through from distributors may vary.
